title: Association between Killer Immunoglobulin-like receptor genes and susceptibility to inflammatory bowel disease: An updated meta-analysis
content:
Publication date: 30 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 14

Author(s): Giovanna Isabel Ponce, Miguel Ángel Recendiz-Nuñez, César García-Torreros, Sonia Sifuentes-Franco, Moisés Enciso-Vargas, Irám Pablo Rodríguez-Sánchez, Selene Guadalupe Huerta-Olvera, Omar Graciano-Machuca
